name: Bat-
originalText:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn,
Augment {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Reveal this card from your hand: Combine it with target host. Augment only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: In a multiplayer game, the triggered ability will trigger no more than once a turn, even if multiple opponents lost 3 life during the turn.
If the only opponent who lost 3 life during the turn isn’t in the game at the beginning of that turn’s end step, the triggered ability will still trigger.
